title: Main Hoon Na
writer: Farah Khan, Abbas Tyrewala, Rajesh Saathi
short_cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Sunil Shetty, Sushmita Sen, Zayed Khan, Amrita Rao, Kiron Kher, Boman Irani, Bindu, Naseeruddin Shah, Kabir Bedi

desc: Major Ram Prasad Sharma yearns to see project Mission Milaap come to fruition and usher in an era of peace between two warring countries. But the evil Raghavan will do anything to stop the peace process.
